common_errors.description: Student past de power rule verkeerd toe.
common_errors.drill_prompt: Pas de power rule toe op: g(x) = 5x^3.

common_errors.description: Student vergeet dat de afgeleide van een constante 0 is.
common_errors.drill_prompt: Wat is de afgeleide van h(x) = 7?

integration_test.prompt: Bereken de afgeleide van f(x) = x^3 - 2x + 1

concepts.meaning: This is a linear equation. It means: find the value of x that makes the statement true.
Adding 7 to both sides cancels the -7 on the left side.
Dividing both sides by 5 isolates x.
